TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AcceleratorTypeConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

Docs.summary: Class that the XAML parser uses to convert strings to objects.
Docs.remarks: The given string value may contain a combination of "CTRL", "CMD", "ALT", "SHIFT", "FN", or "WIN", in any combination of upper or lower case letters, as well as any available keys on the platform. The returned has its array filled with the specified modifiers, and its array filled with the remaining keys.
